# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="15403-102">Aggiunta di flag e promemoria in Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="15403-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="15403-103">Per impostare o modificare un promemoria per un evento:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="15403-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="15403-104">Passare a [Calendario](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="15403-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="15403-105">Seleziona l'evento di cui vuoi essere ricordato, quindi seleziona le frecce nell'angolo in alto a destra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="15403-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="15403-106">per espanderla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="15403-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="15403-107">Accanto a **Ricordami**, scegli un tempo di promemoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="15403-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="15403-108">Outlook.com salva automaticamente le modifiche apportate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="15403-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="15403-109">Per ricordarsi di seguire un messaggio, è possibile aggiungere un contrassegno di follow-up:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="15403-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="15403-110">Vai a [posta elettronica](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="15403-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="15403-111">Nell'elenco dei messaggi, posizionare il puntatore del mouse sul messaggio per visualizzare l'opzione contrassegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="15403-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="15403-112">Seleziona l'icona del contrassegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="15403-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="15403-113">per contrassegnare il messaggio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="15403-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="15403-114">Per visualizzare tutti i messaggi contrassegnati, seleziona il segno di spunta nell'angolo in basso a sinistra della pagina per accedere alle attività.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="15403-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="15403-115">Per ulteriori informazioni, leggere [il contrassegno o il pin di un messaggio in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="15403-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
